transcription: You've reached Chris Dodson with Recovery Logistics. I'm unable to take your call at this time, but if you leave me a message I'll be sure to get back to you as soon as possible.  My name is Chris Dodson. This is my 2015 Ford Super Duty Stella. I own and operate Recovery Logistics here in Dallas, Texas. It's a top-shelf, free possession firm. This truck is like what happens when somebody spends 13 years in a truck and they're  money catches up with their imagination and when I built this it was everything that I could possibly want I did it I didn't hold anything back. This truck features a full Kelderman air ride conversion, four link in the rear and airstrut conversion in the front.  Stella features a Miller Industries Intruder II. That's the model of the Wrecker bed. It's got a 22 inch American Force stripes wrapped in Nittos. Probably got about 147,000 lumens worth of rigid lighting on the truck. 360.  the way around.  Keg Media for helping out with design and rendering. Also like to thank Dubb Magazine for the four page feature this month. She's in the spring edition. Thank Dale Martin for amazing photography. I truly built this truck to be driven daily and to work. From the wheels up and it's time for her to go to another home.  so  you
